title: Katie Price livid over 1/10 sex score - but doesn't care about coke shame slurs
text:

After years of rating her ex-lovers' bedroom performances, Katie Price has been given a taste of her own medicine - and she doesn't like it.

The 41-year-old former glamour model has been left raging after Charles Drury rated her a measly 1/10 for her "lazy" sexploits.

The 22-year-old builder and model claimed she jumped into bed with him the first time they met, and snorted coke together before he passed out.

But he moaned her performance wasn't anything to brag about to his mates, adding: "I thought it was going to be better than what I expected. I was disappointed."

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

Now an insider close to Katie tells Mirror Online that the mum of five is "livid" with Charles rating her sexual prowess so low.

"She's obviously going to be annoyed at the drug claims he's made about her, but rating her a one out of ten in bed is going to land him in really hot water with her," said our source.

"Katie's whole image has been built up on her sex appeal, so implying she's rubbish in bed she will take to heart.

"In the past she's had boyfriends say some unpleasant things about her, but none have ever criticised her in this way."

Katie will be pulling out all the stops with on/off lover Kris Boyson in a bid to heal from her hurt pride.

"Kris is a lucky guy right now, because she will be putting in a lot of effort to prove she's still go what it takes and Charles claims are wrong," the insider added.

"Anything less than an eight out of ten in bed will leave Katie angry, but a one out of ten will leave her fuming."

It comes after Katie lashed out at Charles, branding him a "little boy" who couldn't wait to sell stories on her.

(Image: Youtube)

"Kate is not angry with Charles. Given what she now knows about him it was inevitable he would sell a story to try to publicise himself," her rep told us.

"Kris and Kate are over Charles, who is behaving like the little boy he is."

Meanwhile, Charles has savagely insinuated that Katie has cheated as he returned to Instagram with a not-so-subtle message for her.

"Sleeping alone is better than sharing your bed with someone who shares their bed with someone else when you're not around," he posted on his Story.

"Especially if they are married."

Mirror Online has contacted Katie's rep for comment.
description: Katie Price has been left raging after her toyboy lover Charles Drury told the world she's not up to much in the sack
